name: Spacing Atlas
description:
Note: Graphics & lightning will be much better on desktop builds. Try desktop version if you want better graphics & performance.

Movement:

WASD : Movement

Space: Speed Boost

Mouse Wheel: Zoom in-out

Gameplay:

Destroy all space objects by kiting rockets. If you make Earth people angry, they will shoot rockets at you. To make them angry, you should move fast around world (40+ km/h), they will only shoot it when you are close to it (Distance meter must be red). Arrow above you will point to closest planet.

Tips:

Destroying Earth early means no more rockets will spawn.

Other planets will start floating around randomly when you destroy Sun.

(pro tip: order should be other planets, Sun, and then Earth)

Don't worry about using km as distance unit. This is an imaginary solar system :)

Assets used:

Space sound Created by Jonathan Shaw (InspectorJ): https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds

Asteroid Model: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-rocks

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Josefin+Sans#about

Sun & Planet Textures: https://www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/space-music-out-there
